name: chair_prototype1.jpg
title: Toddler Mobility Chair Prototype 1
description: Cushions, straps, and chest plate prototype for a toddler mobility chair. Many iterations were made and ultimately templated to help facilitate easy reproducibility for the Design Innovation Lab's Fall 2024 Build-A-Thon.
alt: Image of the a toddler mobility trainer prototype, focusing on the seat cushion.
